languages.text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "А ты, значит, не смиряешься? Не просишь моей помощи, не будешь на меня работать, не станешь убивать в обмен на безопасность и комфорт? Правда?"

{n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"
languages.original_text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "А ты, значит, не смиряешься? Не просишь моей помощи, не будешь на меня работать, не станешь убивать в обмен на безопасность и комфорт? Правда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“但你并不打算彻底放弃，是这样吧？你并不打算寻求我的帮助，不打算为我卖命，也不打算靠杀戮换取安全与舒适的生活，我没说错吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“但你并不打算彻底放弃，是这样吧？你并不打算寻求我的帮助，不打算为我卖命，也不打算靠杀戮换取安全与舒适的生活，我没说错吧？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Pero no vas a resignarte, ¿verdad? No vas a pedirme ayuda, no vas a trabajar para mí y tampoco vas a matar a cambio de seguridad y comodidad, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Pero no vas a resignarte, ¿verdad? No vas a pedirme ayuda, no vas a trabajar para mí y tampoco vas a matar a cambio de seguridad y comodidad, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「でも、貴様は諦めないんだろう？私の助けも求めず、私のために働くこともなく、安全や安らぎと引き換えに殺しもしない…そういうことだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「でも、貴様は諦めないんだろう？私の助けも求めず、私のために働くこともなく、安全や安らぎと引き換えに殺しもしない…そういうことだろう？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Aber Ihr werdet Euch nicht einfach fügen, ja? Ihr bittet mich nicht um Hilfe, Ihr werdet nicht für mich arbeiten, werdet nicht im Tausch gegen Sicherheit und Komfort töten? Nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Aber Ihr werdet Euch nicht einfach fügen, ja? Ihr bittet mich nicht um Hilfe, Ihr werdet nicht für mich arbeiten, werdet nicht im Tausch gegen Sicherheit und Komfort töten? Nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Alors que vous, vous n'êtes pas {mf|prêt|prête} à vous résigner, si je comprends bien ? Vous ne réclamez pas mon aide, vous refusez de travailler pour moi et vous ne comptez pas tuer pour obtenir la sécurité et le confort ? C'est ça ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Alors que vous, vous n'êtes pas {mf|prêt|prête} à vous résigner, si je comprends bien ? Vous ne réclamez pas mon aide, vous refusez de travailler pour moi et vous ne comptez pas tuer pour obtenir la sécurité et le confort ? C'est ça ? »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Yılan, kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Sen durumunu kabullenmeyecek misin? Benden yardım istemiyorsun, bana çalışmaya niyetin yok. Korumama nail olmak için elini kana bulamayacaksın, öyle mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "But you're not going to resign yourself, is that it? You're not asking for my help, you're not going to work for me, not going to kill in exchange for security and comfort? Right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yılan kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Sen kabullenmeyeceksin yani, ha? Benden yardım da istemiyorsun, bana çalışmaya da niyetin yok. Rahat edip güvende olmak için elini kana bulamayacaksın, doğru muyum?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
